1 #ifndef ENUM_H
2 #define ENUM_H
3 
4 // cf. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5093460/how-to-convert-an-enum-type-variable-to-a-string
5 // define an enum like this:
6 // DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS(OS_type, (Linux)(Apple)(Windows))
7 
8 #include <vector>
9 #include <string>
10 #include <boost/preprocessor.hpp>
11 
12 #ifdef ENUMS_FOR_PYTHON
13 #include "pybind.h"
14 #endif
15 
16 #define X_DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS_TOSTRING_CASE(r, data, elem) \
17  case elem: return BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(elem);
18 
19 #define X_DEFINE_ENUM_FOR_PYTHON_VALUE(r, data, elem) \
20  .value(BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(elem), elem)
21 
22 #define X_DEFINE_ENUM_ADD_VALUE(r, data, elem) \
23  values.emplace_back(BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(elem));
24 
25 #ifdef ENUMS_FOR_PYTHON
26 #define DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS(name, enumerators) \
27 enum name { \
28  BOOST_PP_SEQ_ENUM(enumerators) \
29 }; \
30  \
31 static inline const char *toString(name v) { \
32  switch (v) { \
33  BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( \
34  X_DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS_TOSTRING_CASE, \
35  name, \
36  enumerators \
37  ) \
38  default: return "[Unknown " BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(name) "]"; \
39  } \
40 } \
41 \
42 static inline std::vector<std::string> valueList(name) { \
43  std::vector<std::string> values; \
44  BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( \
45  X_DEFINE_ENUM_ADD_VALUE, \
46  name, \
47  enumerators \
48  ) \
49  return values; \
50 } \
51 \
52 template <class Scope> \
53 static inline void enumForPython_##name(const Scope &scope, const char *pythonName) { \
54  namespace py = pybind11; \
55  py::enum_<name>(scope, pythonName) \
56  BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( \
57  X_DEFINE_ENUM_FOR_PYTHON_VALUE, \
58  name, \
59  enumerators \
60  ) \
61  .export_values(); \
62 }
63 #else
64 #define DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS(name, enumerators) \
65 enum name { \
66  BOOST_PP_SEQ_ENUM(enumerators) \
67 }; \
68  \
69 static inline const char *toString(name v) { \
70  switch (v) { \
71  BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( \
72  X_DEFINE_ENUM_WITH_STRING_CONVERSIONS_TOSTRING_CASE, \
73  name, \
74  enumerators \
75  ) \
76  default: return "[Unknown " BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(name) "]"; \
77  } \
78 } \
79 \
80 static inline std::vector<std::string> valueList(name) { \
81  std::vector<std::string> values; \
82  BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( \
83  X_DEFINE_ENUM_ADD_VALUE, \
84  name, \
85  enumerators \
86  ) \
87  return values; \
88 }
89 #endif
90 
91 #define V_ENUM_OUTPUT_OP(name, scope) \
92  inline std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &s, scope::name v) { \
93  s << scope::toString(v) << " (" << (int)v << ")"; \
94  return s; \
95 }
96 
97 #define V_ENUM_SET_CHOICES_SCOPE(param, name, scope) \
98  setParameterChoices(param, scope::valueList((scope::name)0))
99 
100 #define V_ENUM_SET_CHOICES(param, name) \
101  setParameterChoices(param, valueList((name)0))
102 #endif
